title: Real-World Integrated Information Literacy Projects for Engineering Graduate Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and foundational knowledge in engineering disciplines
context.additional_context: Customized Design for Developing Information Collection, Analysis, and Utilization Skills in Solving Engineering Problems, Utilizing Smartphone-Based Information Search and Collaboration Tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify reliable information sources with 80% accuracy for solving real-world engineering problems.
Learners can apply information evaluation criteria to write critical analysis reports three or more times in team-based PBL activities.
Learners can build a personal system for systematically collecting and managing engineering-related information in mobile environments.
Learners can present two or more case studies demonstrating the application of information that reflects academic and practical standards in project deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
